description: From a series of four etchings for the story "Der Rebell" by Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918; man in lower left corner with hands holding onto a railing in front of him; sketchily drawn figures behind him, some wearing hats
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: Probedruck 1. | LL of sheet, in pencil: E.120-I. | LR of sheet, in pencil: Liebe Pina. 27/4 19. | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2285
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel), Manfred Georg, Heinrich Hochstim-Verlag, Berlin, 1918
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18.
title: Robert in the Theater, Plate 2 from Der Rebell (The Rebel)
